item.title: Taking the E out of M&E for Governance Projects
item.description: A thought exploration of to more properly evaluate governance projects for international development. The title may be clickbait, as the post is less about taking the E out of M&E and more about making the case for the E coming a reasonable amount of time after the project is completed.
